history.author: guy_joseph
history.post: I am an old fan of George Noory, and his full team of specialists in various fields. Sinceworking in security, I had the pleasure of listening to most of the information that’s veryinteresting, informative, and accurate.I thank Coast to Coast, and all of its Staff, for all the trouble taken to assimilate and sift,and then broadcast for the thousands of your fans.Sincerely,Guy (navy67228guy@yahoo.com)
history.title: SHROUD OF TURIN from “COAST TO COAST AM” on YouTube and Show’s Website

history.author: guy_joseph
history.post: Even though I am not regular in correspondence, it would be honor for meto contact George Noori. Can I get his e-mail address?
